title: Love at a Venture
description:
Belair is chasing several ladies at the same time: "Thus different Women give us different Joys. Beauty in one; in t'other Wit we find; In this a Shape, in that a spacious Mind." However, he may well have met his match(es) this time as the plots and counter-plots swirl around him.... - Summary by ToddHW

Cast list:
